meanings.sent1: The toey squirrel kept darting around the tree.
meanings.sent2: She felt toey before the big test.
meanings.sent3: The toey puppy couldn't sit still during the training session.
meanings.sent4: His toey behavior made it hard to focus on the movie.
meanings.sent5: The toey feeling in her stomach wouldn't go away.

meanings.sent1: The toey sock had a hole near the big toe.
meanings.sent2: He wore comfortable shoes that didn't feel toey.
meanings.sent3: The toey footprints in the sand led to the water.
meanings.sent4: Her toey toes wiggled in the warm sand.
meanings.sent5: The toey sensation in his foot was caused by a pebble in his shoe.

meanings.definition: To kick or touch with the toes
meanings.sent1: She toeyed the ball gently to her teammate.
meanings.sent2: He toeyed the door closed without making a sound.
meanings.sent3: The toddler toeyed the toy car across the room.
meanings.sent4: He toeyed the rock out of the way with his foot.
meanings.sent5: She toeyed the switch to turn off the light.
